text: The men's 4 x 100 metres relay event at the 2007 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Debrecen, Hungary, at Gyulai István Atlétikai Stadion on 15 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Ryan Scott Craig Pickering Rikki Fifton James Ellington ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Dany Gonçalves Arnaldo Abrantes Ricardo Martins Yazaldes Nascimento ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Hannu Hämäläinen Visa Hongisto Rami Jokinen Jonathan Åstrand ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 15 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
